actions.text: Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 232 (Roll no. 351).

description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary of Defense, prior to awarding of defense contracts to private contractors, to conduct an outreach program to benefit minority and women-owned businesses.
purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in House Report 112-88 to require the Secretary of Defense, prior to awarding of defense contracts to private contractors, to conduct an outreach program to benefit minority and women-owned businesses.
